name: A Guy's Dreams
description:
Journey through the dreams of some guy who seem haunted by some things...

-It's just a project taking form while i'm learning pixel art and GB Studio.-

/!\ The download is a gameboy rom, find your own way to run it !

Commands : 

Arrow keys or WASD  to move

Z,J  for the A button

X,K for the B button
